comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: 149th Fighter Bomber Squadron - later Tactical Fighter Squadron - now just plain old Fighter Squadron.

comment.author: 34817627991@N01
comment._content: First row from left... are those Lockheed T33s? And behind the DC3, is that a Beechcraft?

comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: A higher res image would help, but best guess is two T-33s and a Beech C-45 - the "Admin" part of the flight line, mostly used by the staff weenies putting in their 4 hrs/month to keep their flying status. T-33s were sometimes used for target tows in aerial gunnery practice.

comment.author: 56077378@N06
comment._content: Really miss not being able to visit there anymore. In unit from 62-68. Worked on flight line. All is gone now. Now somewhere at Langley.
